channel.title: Posts on The Guillemets Project
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Guillemets Project

item.title: ✨ Ep 1: Our Journey Through French
item.description: Listen to our “Journey through French” on the following platforms. Available to listen on all podcast platforms Transcription: SS: Ouvrez les guillemets. AO: Welcome to The Guillemets Project, a UVA podcast about language learning and technology. AO: Bienvenue au notre premier épisode du podcast, un épisode bilingue en Anglais et en Français. SS: Bonjour, je m’appelle Spyros, et je suis enseignant de français à l’université de Virginie. AO: Salut, je m’appelle Alexis, et je suis étudiante d’informatique et de français à l’université de virginie.

item.title: Trailer Episode
item.description: Welcome to our podcast! Our project explores how real-life online technology impacts French language learning. Join us on our journey! Available to listen on all podcast platforms Transcription: AO: How does technology impact language learning? SS: Since when has the internet become a dictionary? How many other digital platforms are frequently used by language students, and what are they? AO: There are countless language learning applications, but do they really deliver on their promise to make you bilingual?
